Banner.Description: I'm a motivated software engineer passionate about exploring new technologies. I enjoy contributing to innovative projects and continuously learning while writing clean, reusable, and scalable code using Angular, Spring Boot, and modern web tools.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Engineer in Software Engineering from TEK-UP Tunisia with strong experience in both frontend and backend development.
I've completed several internships and academic projects using technologies like Angular, Spring Boot, MySQL, MongoDB, Docker, and Kubernetes.
My strengths include teamwork, DevOps knowledge, and the ability to implement scalable microservice architectures.
I have also developed applications for healthcare, agriculture, law firms, sports management, and freelancing platforms.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer Intern (Engineer PFE)
Description: Developed a runtime trace visualization module for factory testers in the automotive sector.
Used Java, Eclipse RCP, performance optimization, memory management, debugging.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer Intern
Description: Built an online food ordering platform with real-time features and scheduling.
Technologies: Angular, Spring Boot, MySQL, Docker, Kubernetes.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer Intern
Description: Developed an E-learning platform with intuitive UI/UX.
Used Angular, TypeScript, Git, JWT, Scrum.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer Intern (Bachelor PFE)
Description: Built a spare parts management platform.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: HealthCare
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: AI-based health platform that analyzes patient symptoms and offers personalized medical recommendations in real-time.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agriculture Platform
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Microservices-based platform enabling communication between farmers and engineers, with notifications, email integration, and feedback.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: LawFirm
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Platform for lawyers and clients to manage legal cases efficiently.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Upwork Clone
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Platform connecting freelancers and clients for various project collaborations.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Sports Manager
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Application to manage soccer teams, matches, players, and stadiums, with real-time weather API integration.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects
Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: Feel free to reach out if you want to collaborate or discuss new opportunities. I'll respond as soon as I can!
